abstract: The sale of advertising keywords does not amount to trademark infringement, the adviser to the European Union’s top court said.
snippet: The sale of advertising keywords does not amount to trademark infringement, the adviser to the European Union’s top court said.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  A legal adviser to the European Union’s top court backed Google in a trademark case on Tuesday, saying the company should be allowed to sell brand names like Louis Vuitton or Coca-Cola as advertising keywords.

headline.main: European Adviser Backs Google on Trademarks
headline.print_headline: European Adviser Backs Google on Trademarks
